betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Studying the shards has lead you to realize they are each infused with a particular aspect, a foundational building block of this magic that you have yet to lay proper eyes on. These six primal aspects - Aer, Aqua, Ignis, Ordo, Perditio and Terra - can than be combined to create more complex compound aspects... but the shards will not let themselves be combined so easily. You will need to learn so much more before you will be able to draw the full potential out of these rich crystals.

To that end you've created the Thaumometer. With the help of all six shards you will not only be able to finally see nodes properly, but scan them so you can learn a bit more about the aspects they contain. In addition you can scan items and learn what aspects they contain, learning more of their secrets in the process.

There is one complication: In order to discover a compound aspect you must know both the component aspects it's made up of. Given the challenge you expect will come from finding samples you're able to study, which don't contain anything you can't make sense of yet, you have to wonder if you can study aspects another way...
